## ðŸ“¬ Private or Security-Related Support

If your concern is **private**, **account-specific**, or **security-related**, please contact us directly:

ðŸ“§ [**support@ajayos.in**](mailto:support@ajayos.in)

---

## ðŸ¤ Support Guidelines

To help us assist you effectively, please include:
- Relevant context or use case
- Error messages or logs (if any)
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Environment details (OS, version, device)
